comments.body: Please make sure to test these changes across our platform matrix.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +239,243 @@            # On N35 A8 images, some features return a yes/no prompt
            # on enablement or disablement. Bypass using terminal dont-ask
            cmds.insert(0, 'terminal dont-ask')
            if not module.check_mode:
                load_config(module, cmds)
